item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>Excellent article about those unusually large and un-turkeylike turkeys legs! I can't believe that you're going back so soon - this time last week we were back on the Spiderman ride! Fi and I have been listening to the Cirque du Soleil soundtrack for La Nouba that we bought whilst there - it brought back memories of how amazing it was - thanks for a top Christmas prezzie!</p>
item.content:encoded: Excellent article about those unusually large and un-turkeylike turkeys legs! I can’t believe that you’re going back so soon – this time last week we were back on the Spiderman ride! Fi and I have been listening to the Cirque du Soleil soundtrack for La Nouba that we bought whilst there – it brought back memories of how amazing it was – thanks for a top Christmas prezzie!
